publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2738 Lewis Macdonald: Congratulations to Cinnamon Aberdeenâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the Cinnamon restaurant in Aberdeen on its success in winning the British Curry Award for Best Restaurant in Scotland and Northern Ireland for 2008 and wishes the restaurant every success in the future. Supported by: Mr Frank McAveety*, John Park*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Richard Baker*, Helen Eadie*, Robin Harper*, Nanette Milne*, Trish Godman*, Jamie McGrigor*, Mary Mulligan*, Jamie Hepburn*
